backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Review the materials for my meeting with senior leadership and suggest the best way to summarize the topics into three main discussion points. Generate any objections or concerns that might come up and give me effective responses.

gutts.name: Material Review and Extraction
gutts.capability: Read and analyze the provided meeting materials to extract key information and insights relevant to senior leadership discussions.
gutts.user_goal: Obtain a clear understanding of the materialâ€™s content to inform summary creation and objection anticipation.

gutts.name: Summarization into Key Discussion Points
gutts.capability: Condense the extracted information into three concise, high-level discussion points suitable for senior leadership presentation.
gutts.user_goal: Provide a structured summary that highlights the most important topics for the meeting.

gutts.name: Objection Anticipation
gutts.capability: Predict potential objections or concerns that senior leadership may raise regarding the discussed topics.
gutts.user_goal: Identify possible resistance points to prepare for the discussion.

gutts.name: Response Generation
gutts.capability: Generate effective, persuasive responses to each anticipated objection to address concerns and support the discussion points.
gutts.user_goal: Equip the user with prepared answers to smoothly counter objections during the meeting.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
